name: Drivenotepad.GitHub.io
body:
### Drive Notepad

Drive Notepad is not affiliated with Google. It is made by DM in his spare time.   

The app is hosted [free on github](https://help.github.com/categories/github-pages-basics/), and Google API requests are also [fulfilled for free](http://stackoverflow.com/a/10313416/2399799).  This means it costs nothing to keep the app up and running, and hence it can be provided to users for free. Yay!

### News

Mar 2016. The app is undergoing its biennial refresh, but the current development version is already live [here](/app)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
